original_text: So Joseph helped his father and his brothers to make their home in Egypt. He gave them a good place to live in the best region of Egypt. This was in the region that is now called Rameses. Joseph did for his family what Pharaoh had told him to do.
korean_text: 요셉이 바로의 명령대로 그의 아버지와 그의 형들에게 거주할 곳을 주되 애굽의 좋은 땅 라암셋을 그들에게 주어 소유로 삼게 하고

sentences.original_text: So Joseph helped his father and his brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 요셉은 자기 아버지와 형들을 도왔습니다

sentences.original_text: to make their home in Egypt
He gave them a good place to live
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 살 좋은 곳을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: in the best region of Egypt
what Pharaoh had told him to do
